docs.snippet: Capt. W.M. GARDNER, of the Second Infantry, writing from Fort Acercombe, on July 10th, gives an exceedingly interesting account of an impromptu method of crossing a river which was not properly laid down on the maps. His command, consisting of...
docs.lead_paragraph: Capt. W.M. GARDNER, of the Second Infantry, writing from Fort Acercombe, on July 10th, gives an exceedingly interesting account of an impromptu method of crossing a river which was not properly laid down on the maps. His command, consisting of Companies A, D, and I, Second Regiment of Foot, left Fort Randall on the 5th July.

docs.snippet: MEETING OF THE MANAGERS OF THE AMERICAN BIBLE SOCIETY At the last meeting of the Managers of the American Bible Society, five new auxiliaries  were recognized: one in Ohio, one in Georgia, and there in Texas.
docs.lead_paragraph: MEETING OF THE MANAGERS OF THE AMERICAN BIBLE SOCIETY At the last meeting of the Managers of the American Bible Society, five new auxiliaries were recognized: one in Ohio, one in Georgia, and there in Texas.

docs.snippet: The various and arduous pursuits of pleasure  and health, with which the present century relaxes its business of money-making, induce or compel so many people to visit Europe in "the season of the year," that it has become a matter of interest to...

headline.main: NORTHERN GERMANY.; Arrival at Hamburg The Steam Live to New-York Architectural Traits of Hamburgh Hotel Life A German Stovo Rais Forever The Streets.

docs.lead_paragraph: The various and arduous pursuits of pleasure and health, with which the present century relaxes its business of money-making, induce or compel so many people to visit Europe in "the season of the year," that it has become a matter of interest to watch the increasing current and note the points to which it washes so considerable a proportion of our floating population.

docs.snippet: The attendance of delegates to the Breckinridge and Lane Democratic Sate Convention at present is light. but a number of delegates will arrive by the next train.

headline.main: STATE POLITICS.; The Brockinridge and Lane Democratic Convention. ANOTHER REPORT. Miscellaneous Political Matters. Kentucky State Election. North Carolina Election. Missouri State Election. Later from Vera Cruz. The Philadelphia and Baltimore Central Railroad. The National Masonic School of Instruction. Reward for the Capture of Cross, the Escaped Forger. Explosion at a Distillery. Later from Brazos. Destructive Fire. Non-Arrival of the Canadian.

docs.lead_paragraph: The attendance of delegates to the Breckinridge and Lane Democratic Sate Convention at present is light. but a number of delegates will arrive by the next train.

docs.snippet: There is a strange fatality about the ancient office of Alderman. Once the glory of the Saxon aristocracy, it has come to be the shame of American Democracy; once significant of honest wisdom in peace, and of active valor in war, it has come to be...
docs.lead_paragraph: There is a strange fatality about the ancient office of Alderman. Once the glory of the Saxon aristocracy, it has come to be the shame of American Democracy; once significant of honest wisdom in peace, and of active valor in war, it has come to be synonymous in America with astute knavery, and in England with obese imbecility.

docs.snippet: One very grave error was impressed upon the public mind by the returns of the census of 1850, and, doubtless, will again be by those of that now gathered, owing to an attempt to collect statistics upon a subject which experience has proved to be...
docs.lead_paragraph: One very grave error was impressed upon the public mind by the returns of the census of 1850, and, doubtless, will again be by those of that now gathered, owing to an attempt to collect statistics upon a subject which experience has proved to be unattainable by mere inquiry from house to house.

headline.main: SOUTHERN GERMANY.; The Unprecedented Weather Dis weed Refugees The Quarrel in Budon Independence Day at Heidelburg GermanPolicies College Emeuto at Leipzig TheArsenic Eaters of Stefermark.

docs.lead_paragraph: It is one of the peculiarities of the so-called climate of Munich, which is, after all, as the French say, no climate but weather only, that each season is in some respect unprecedented; and every year astonishes, in its meteorological developments, the oldest inhabitant himself.

docs.snippet: According to the returns already received at the Census Bureau at Washington, the crops in all the Northern and Northwestern States are immensely heavy this year.
docs.lead_paragraph: According to the returns already received at the Census Bureau at Washington, the crops in all the Northern and Northwestern States are immensely heavy this year.
